responses: Hello, Kindly choose from one of the following to get started.

Mother Theresa Institute of Engineering and Technology, a premier Engineering College, was established in the year 2010 with the objective of developing competent and responsible technocrats for the futuristic needs of India. Promoted by 'Holy Cross Educational Society, Palamaner'.
We have 800+ students studying with us.
To visit the campus you can proceed by choosing further below options.
The address of MTIET is: Jawahar Education Societys,Institute of Technology, Management & Research, Survey No 48, Gowardhan, Gangapur Road, Nashik - 422 222. Maharashtra, India
You can visit us between 9 AM to 2 PM from MONDAY to SATURDAY.
You can contact us on: 0253 2970077, 0253 2970078 , 9022025101 , Email us on: MTIETnashik2012@gmail.com, principalMTIETnashik@rediffmail.com
We provide below mentioned courses. Please select one to know more.
What do you want to know about Computer engineering? Please choose further to know.
Please select one from below options
MTIET has intake of 120 students for First Year
MTIET has intake of 20 students for DSY[NOTE: Intake number varies every academic year.]
Select a category to know the fee
Fee for an OPEN category student is : RS 72000 (Excluding university exam fee)
Fee for an OBC category student is : RS 55000 (Excluding university exam fee)
Fee for a SC/ST category student is RS ABC (Excluding university exam fee)

The criteria for Engineering in MTIET are as follows: A minimum aggregate of 50% or equivalent in 10+2.Compulsory Subjects: Physics & Mathematics; and anyone of the following: Chemistry, Computer Science. Minimum passing mark is essential in each of the subject.
The duration for the Engineering offered at MTIET is 4 years.
